Articles.Content: Is there any way to determine the order in which RCS tanks are drained? I have RCS tanks in 2 seperate stages of a vehicle and would obviously like the first RCS fuel drained to be in the stage that is discarded first.

Is there any way to determine the order in which RCS tanks are drained? I have RCS tanks in 2 seperate stages of a vehicle and would obviously like the first RCS fuel drained to be in the stage that is discarded first.

According to the wiki, the bottom most fueled RCS tank (likely the first to be discarded) is drawn from first.

Ill have to shuffle some stuff around then

thx
